data.text: @BBCNews I cant wait for the wedding xxxxxx

@BBCNews In other news BBC News (UK) Twitter feed is hijacked by morons who can't help stating the obvious and posting irrelevant nonsense. More to follow... Unfortunately.

@Freder_2 @BBCNews I was intrigued you had factual evidence to back up the accusation you made that the next in line to the throne was a paedfophile, like a lot of keyboard warriers you make accusations based on a rumour with out facts & that is wrong only my opinion as i dont speak for others!
@BBCNews That is how it should be too, God bless this couple
@BBCNews That'll be a hold your breath moment. Will she have to prop him up? Assume he won't be making a speech?

@Bluejeans63 @BBCNews Really?? Interesting wow

@Freder_2 @BBCNews So you have gone from making a statement you obviously believed to be fact, condemming the heir to the throne as being a paedophile,to latterly 5 tweets later admitting the suggestion is actually not as it happens a fact but simpy a rumour! brilliant! got to the truth in the end.
@OhemaAgyei @BBCNews There are none, they’re made up.

@Bluejeans63 @BBCNews Ok
What were the controversies for then

@OhemaAgyei @BBCNews There is zero controversy.
